0.Description: We here at Google are constantly on the lookout for fresh talent to help us design our products to improve the user experience. Join us today!
Requirements: Degree in field of Design, Cognitive Science, or HCI
An understanding of how to gather user data and use it to improve UX

1.Description: We here at Google are constantly looking for fresh new talent to help us improve our old products and create new products. Join today!
Requirements: B.S. or B.A. in Computer Science
Proficiency with Java, C++, or Python

2.Description: Help refine old UIs and design new UIs for our applications.
Requirements: Degree in the fields of Graphic/Visual Design, Cognitive Science, or HCI
Proficient using Sketch, Photoshop, or other relevant design tools
Understands user interface design, heuristic methods, or other usability evaluations
